name: Project Graviton (itch) (amdotblacksheep)
description:
This game is a submission to the Kenney Game Jam 2021.

Project Graviton is a puzzle platform videogame, where you can manipulate gravity.

An alien race is developing a project to take over the universe. YOU ARE THE PROJECT. Solve all the puzzles and prove they can count on you.

Credits:

  • A game by amdotblacksheep
  • Art, music, sound effects, font by Kenney
